suite.name: Nfc Basic

test.name: Reset NFC Reseting RF configuration

kw.name: Open Nfc Connection Via Uart
kw.msg: ${NFC_INTERFACE} = timeoutExceptionOnTimeoutSerial<id=0x70c763e02f20, open=True>(port='/dev/serial/by-id/usb-STMicroelectronics_STM32_STLink_066EFF3031454D3043225321-if02', baudrate=115200, bytesize=8, parity='N', stopb...
kw.doc: Opens a connection to a NFC device via UART.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.msg: Slept 250 milliseconds.
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Empty Nfc Connection Receive Buffer
kw.doc: Empties the receive buffer.

kw.name: Modify the element located at 'payload.ResetType' of '${NFC_RST_CMD}' to '${CORE_RESET_CMD.RESET_CONFIGURATION}'
kw.source_name: Modify the element located at '${locator}' of '${constructDict}' to '${value}'
kw.doc: Modifies the element located at locator in constructDict to the value value.

kw.name: Write Binary Data Generated From '${NFC_RST_CMD}' Using Construct '${nfcControlPacket}' To '${NFC_INTERFACE}'
kw.source_name: Write binary data generated from '${data}' using construct '${identifier}' to '${file}'
kw.msg: built: 20 00 01 01 (a total of 4 bytes) using "<Compiled NFC_CONTROL_PACKET>" from :" {'header': {'GID': EnumIntegerString.new(0, 'CORE'), 'MT': EnumIntegerString.new(1, 'ControlPacketCommand'), 'OID': EnumIntegerString.new(0, 'CORE_RESET'), 'PBF': 0, 'RFU': 0}, 'padding': b'', 'payload': {'ResetType': EnumIntegerString.new(1, 'RESET_CONFIGURATION')}, 'payload_length': 1}"
kw.doc: Writes binary data to a file or sends it over a socket.

kw.name: Receive message from nfc from ${nfc_INTERFACE}
Wait For Data From Nfc
kw.doc: Waits for data from the NFC device.

kw.name: Parse '${nfc_INTERFACE}' Using Construct '${nfcControlPacket}'
kw.msg: parsed: Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketResponse 2 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 payload_length = 1 payload = Container: Status = (enum) STATUS_OK 0 NFC_Version = None ConfigurationStatus = None padding = None using <Compiled NFC_CONTROL_PACKET> from 40 00 01 00
${RESPONSE} = Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketResponse 2 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 p...
kw.doc: Parses binary data using a construct. The binary data can be a byte array, a readable binary file object, or a TCP/UDP socket.

kw.msg: ${RESPONSE} = Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketResponse 2 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 p...

kw.name: Element 'header.MT' in '${RESPONSE}' should be equal to '${EXPECTED_MT}'
kw.source_name: Element '${locator}' in '${constructDict}' should be equal to '${expectedValue}'
kw.doc: Checks that the element located at locator in construct is equal to expectedValue.

kw.name: Expect Response from ${NFC_INTERFACE} of type ${MT.ControlPacketNotification}
Receive message from nfc from ${nfc_INTERFACE}
Wait For Data From Nfc
kw.doc: Waits for data from the NFC device.

kw.name: Parse '${nfc_INTERFACE}' Using Construct '${nfcControlPacket}'
kw.msg: parsed: Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketNotification 3 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 payload_length = 9 payload = Container: Reason = (enum) (unknown) 2 ConfigurationStatus = (enum) NFC_RF_CONFIGURATION_RESET 1 padding = b' \x02\x04\x00\x02\x00K' (total 7) using <Compiled NFC_CONTROL_PACKET> from 60 00 09 02 01 20 02 04 00 02 00 4b
${RESPONSE} = Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketNotification 3 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 ...
kw.doc: Parses binary data using a construct. The binary data can be a byte array, a readable binary file object, or a TCP/UDP socket.

kw.msg: ${RESPONSE} = Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketNotification 3 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 ...

kw.name: Element 'header.MT' in '${RESPONSE}' should be equal to '${EXPECTED_MT}'
kw.source_name: Element '${locator}' in '${constructDict}' should be equal to '${expectedValue}'
kw.doc: Checks that the element located at locator in construct is equal to expectedValue.

kw.msg: ${RESET_NOTIFICATION} = Container: header = Container: MT = (enum) ControlPacketNotification 3 PBF = (enum) endOfMessage 0 GID = (enum) CORE 0 RFU = 0 OID = (enum) CORE_RESET 0 ...

kw.name: Element 'payload.ConfigurationStatus' in '${RESET_NOTIFICATION}' should be equal to '${CONFIGURATION_STATUS.NFC_RF_CONFIGURATION_RESET}'
kw.source_name: Element '${locator}' in '${constructDict}' should be equal to '${expectedValue}'
kw.doc: Checks that the element located at locator in construct is equal to expectedValue.

kw.name: Nfc Connection Receive Buffer Should Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the receive buffer is empty.

kw.name: Close Nfc Connection
kw.doc: Closes the NFC connection by closing the serial connection.

test.doc: This test case resets the NFC options using nfc over UART reseting the RF configuration.

suite.doc: This is a simple example for a robot file using robotframework-construct using nfc/nfc as an example using UART.
